# DevOps for .NET

> Continuous integration and deployment for .NET applications. Covers GitHub Actions workflows for building, testing, publishing, and security scanning .NET projects. Includes CI/CD best practices and automation patterns.

- [Tutorial: Create a GitHub Action with .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/devops/create-dotnet-github-action.md): Learn how to create a GitHub Action with a containerized .NET app.
- [Create a build validation GitHub workflow](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/devops/dotnet-build-github-action.md): In this quickstart, you will learn how to create a GitHub workflow to validate .NET app compilation.
- [Use the .NET SDK in Continuous Integration (CI) environments](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/devops/dotnet-cli-and-continuous-integration.md): Learn how to use the .NET SDK and its tools on a build server with continuous integration.
- [.NET-related GitHub Actions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/devops/dotnet-github-action-reference.md): Learn about the available .NET-related GitHub Actions.
- [Create a publish app GitHub workflow](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/devops/dotnet-publish-github-action.md): In this quickstart, you will learn how to create a GitHub workflow to publish your .NET source code.
- [Create a security scan GitHub workflow](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/devops/dotnet-secure-github-action.md): In this quickstart, you will learn how to create a CodeQL GitHub workflow to automate the discovery of vulnerabilities in your .NET codebase.
- [Create a test validation GitHub workflow](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/devops/dotnet-test-github-action.md): In this quickstart, you will learn how to create a GitHub workflow to test your .NET source code.
- [GitHub Actions and .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/devops/github-actions-overview.md): Learn what role GitHub Actions play in .NET application development.
